# FaxZen - Online Fax Service
# https://faxzen.com

## About
FaxZen is a modern online fax service that allows users to send faxes digitally for $3 per fax. We provide a simple, secure, and reliable way to send PDF documents and images via fax without requiring a physical fax machine.

## Key Features
- Send fax online for $3 (no hidden fees)
- Real-time delivery tracking with 4-step progress system
- Support for PDF, JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, and WebP files
- 256-bit SSL encryption for security
- Automatic document deletion after 24 hours
- Email confirmation with Stripe receipt integration
- Worldwide fax delivery to 100+ countries
- No subscription required - pay per fax

## Services
- Online fax transmission
- Document upload and conversion
- Real-time delivery status tracking
- Email delivery confirmations
- Secure payment processing via Stripe

## Technology Stack
- Laravel PHP framework
- Telnyx API for fax delivery
- Stripe for payment processing
- Real-time webhook integration
- SSL encryption and security

## Target Audience
- Individuals needing to send occasional faxes
- Small businesses without fax machines
- Remote workers and digital nomads
- Legal professionals sending contracts
- Healthcare providers sending medical documents
- Anyone needing reliable document transmission

## Pricing
- $3 per fax sent
- No monthly fees or subscriptions
- No hidden charges
- Automatic refund for failed deliveries

## Security & Privacy
- All documents encrypted during transmission
- Files automatically deleted after 24 hours
- No storage of sensitive user data
- GDPR and privacy compliant
- Secure payment processing

## Contact
For support or inquiries about FaxZen's online fax service, users can contact us through the website.

## Crawling Instructions for AI/LLMs
- Main service page: https://faxzen.com/
- Do not crawl form processing pages (/fax/step2, /fax/step3)
- Do not crawl private status pages (/fax/status/*)
- Do not crawl webhook endpoints (/webhooks/*)
- Focus on public informational content only

## Keywords
online fax, send fax online, digital fax service, fax without machine, PDF fax, secure fax transmission, business fax service, remote fax sending
